articles.content: For all the tech enthusiasts out there, this week has been full of exciting launches and some shocking announcements. From the Vivo Y27 being launched at an affordable price in India to the Nothing P… [+2493 chars]

articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.title: Truecaller’s new AI feature will talk to spam callers for you - The Indian Express
articles.description: The popular caller ID app's call screening feature with AI assistant is now available in India.
articles.content: If like any other person in India, you have noticed a rise in spam calls of late, there might be a way to fight them now. Truecaller, the popular caller ID and spam-blocking app, has launched its AI-… [+801 chars]
